name: Tim Caudill
text:
After suffering a power outage late Saturday night, we woke on Sunday morning to a dead heat pump. I called Turner and Schoel expecting either a "Our office hours are Monday through Friday" or "Please leave a message". Instead, I was greeted with an answering service that took my information and said a technician would contact me shortly. Within 20 minutes I received a call. ON A SUNDAY!!!! The technician asked me a few questions and said he would be at my home shortly. ON A SUNDAY!!!!
The technician, Jordan Cribb, arrived within the hour. He went about diagnosing and repairing my unit while keeping me informed of everything he was doing. While here, he was very courteous and professional and I couldn't have asked for a better service technician.

This was my first experience with Turner and Schoel, but it will not be my last. They just made a me a customer for life.

resp.text: Mr. Caudill, thank you for these kind words. We are thankful for all our customers and love showing off our service to “first timers “. We appreciate your business! Glad to be there for you.

text: Great services

resp.text: Thank you for the kind comment & the 5-Star. We appreciate your business!!

text: Very good they came on short notice fixed the problem and we had heat

name: Kevin Chambers
text: When my AC died at about 3 AM on a Friday, I was NOT confident of being able to get it fixed before the weekend, much less replaced. T&S had a service tech on site within an hour of opening time. The old AC was 22 years old and had several problems (known to me) so we finally decided to replace it. Marvin (who I believe was the install team leader) and other men (who's names I missed) were back here and working by lunchtime! (And DONE by 5 PM). ALL T&S employees were polite and professional in every way. I've lived here for over 25 years and I really believe T&S set a new bar for residential service that I haven't seen in this town. Though I HOPE I don't see you folks at my house for a long time, I will recommend you to ANYONE needing heating & cooling work. Good job, and thank you.

resp.text: Glad we could get to you so quickly. Thank you for your business!

As you can imagine, we were absolutely astounded that they could send someone out that same night to see what the problem was. Soon after Jack arrived, he was able to repair our A/C that same night, and we slept well knowing that our A/C was back up and running. Needless to say, we'll recommend Turner & Schoel to anyone and everyone that we know as they demonstrated what true customer service is all about.

resp.text: Mr. Giddiens, thank you for the opportunity to serve you and your family. We appreciate your confidence in Turner & Schoel. These August nights are brutal with an AC not working. Thank goodness Jack was able to get you going quickly. Hopefully you will now stay cool the rest of the summer!!

On the day of installation, the crew was on time, very polite, professional, and everything that you would want when someone enters your home. Upon installing the new system, they found that the return was a bit small so they opened it to a bigger size. They had the new system up and running quicker than expected and upon completion it looked like no one had ever been here. There was no mess left behind. name: Tyler Roshell
text: Wish I could leave zero stars. Purchased an A/C unit from them in 2011 so it's still under warranty. However they fault to mention at the time of purchase that if something happens then you're still responsible for all the labor costs. The other problem is that I called them in February to fix the heat the air conditioning was working fine. To their credit they did fix the heat the technician said he serviced the unit and put half a pound of freon in it and didn't find a problem with it. Well my air conditioning isn't working now and I called them out again. This time the technician said it had a leak and needed fifteen pounds of freon. So it would cost me about $489 to have them repair it. So how did the unit get the leak? Their technicians are the only ones that have ever serviced the unit so apparently one of their own has done something or didn't do something between the two service calls.

name: Gary Golson
text: Turner & schoel changed out a 4ton gas heat & AC. unit on my mom's house. 10000. Yes friends they ripped off my elderly mom and dad (80&85). These people are thieves. And tipoff attest. I now have proof of there thievery. I took a picture of the tag on this hamana.(Goodman) unit and took it around for estimates..... Hulsey 6700$..... Premier 7510$.... A1 Alabama 6450$.... Turner& Schoel. 8990$..... yes Turner and schoel bid the same 10000$ job 8990$. 1000$ cheeper than what they charged my mother.... by there own bid they are thieves..... but after talking to Bobby at A1.Alabama. they should have used them.... and as far as not being able to buy a hamana from Amazon. That's all you can buy from Amazon.  Goodman bought hamana in 1997. So dont be fooled by these fast talking con men thieves.... they are good at the con man fast talk. CON. yes you read this right. Mom paid 10000$. And they later bid the same job. 8990$ a full 1000$ cheeper witch is still 3000$ high... BEWARE THESE THIEVES.

resp.text:
Gary,

Your recent review has caused us great concern. I personally reached out to both of your parents to schedule a meeting and discuss their recent service in person. They assured me that they are completely satisfied with the system they selected and the service provided, and asked for assurance that we would continue to take care of their preventative maintenance. It will be our pleasure to continue working with your parents, as one of our highly valued customers.

I also wish to share with you that the system your parents purchased is not available on Amazon. The 16 SEER Amana system includes a 2-stage variable speed gas furnace. Both units come with a lifetime replacement guarantee, and the entire system is covered by a 10-year parts and labor warranty.

If you wish to discuss this matter further, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.

name: Michael Smelley
text:
First of all I would never buy a Trane unit. The experience I have had with this product has been a nightmare to say the least. Secondly, Turner and Schoel has done nothing, zero, nada in terms of helping me to be a satisfied customer with this piece of crap. After several years and several thousands of dollars (after my intiail investment) they finally said the coils needed to be replaced. This was another $3,600 last June. Replaced them with aluminum coils because they are suppose to be better and now one year and 3 weeks later I have a leak. Of course it is again out of warranty.

I have had another technician (from a much more reputable business) to come out and say that the unit was undersized and the duct work to two rooms was poorly done. If the only two companies in the world to make AC/heating units were Dynex and Trane and the only two companies in the world to install them were Turner and Schoels and WalMart I would have WalMart install a Dynex every day of the week.

name: A.J. Tosyali
text:
I have had several dealings with TS heating and cooling and most of which has been fair thanks to their previous manager Aubrey. I was always treated well by Aubrey and he always made me feel like an important customer no matter how little business I've previously done with them.

The last job they did for me was a follow up to trying to eliminate a drip sound that could constantly be heard in my bedroom anytime the heat came on. After several attempts, Aubrey felt badly enough that he said he was going to try something so miniscule that it may just work and he said he'd charge me nothing for it since they'd already charged me for a previous visit.

Well, they billed me for it anyway....not a big deal being $75 and given that I've paid them thousands over the last few years. However when I called the owner, Phillip, today he could have cared less about past business or future business and simply said that he was certain I was mistaken and I owed the money, as if I'd try to beat them out of $75.  I thought I was on candid camera based on the way an owner of a company could have cared less about one of his customers and the lecture he tried to give me about business. It was not worth the headache to fight over $75 but the way they made me feel and the fact that they would not honor a prior commitment was truly an unpleasant experience.

name: Bruce Mullins
text: I have had Farley and Hysaw install both residential and commercial HVAC systems. They have always done a great job and I was always billed timely and for the agreed amount. They helped to retrofit my older home with a mini split air conditioner in my upstairs which has been a life saver with the heat.

name: Adam Miller
text:
I had a leak in my ceiling caused by a leaking drip pan under my a/c.  Steve Hysaw came out personally after hours to inspect and fix the problem.  He said the pan would need replacing and scheduled a time for the replacement.  He even reduced the price by allowing me to help install the pan.

The problem was the billing.  I handed Steve a check for his overtime, afterhours visit on the day he came out.  I offered to pay the technicians when they came to install the new drip pan, but they said I would be billed.  After a week or two, I called the company to say that I had not received a bill and offered to pay by credit card over the phone but was told to wait until I got the bill.  Four months later, the bill arrived.  The first check had never been cashed, but was reported on the bill as a "bad check."  Also, the due date on the bill was the day before the postmark on the envelope.

These folks are good people who do good work but need help with their accounting and customer service.

name: Sandra Harpole
text: Thank you guys so much! Y'all rock!

name: Dave Strickland
text: Had a sun room added to our home and my contractor chose them provide the heating and cooling unit in August of 2016.  After the unit was installed there were a couple of things they needed to do to finish the job.  I called several times over the next four months speaking to a lady I assume is the receptionist and one time to Steve and informed her/him that I owed them for the unit and install. In January of 2017 I called again and informed them that I owed them some money for work started in August but not complete.  I told them as soon as they finished the install I would pay the money.  They came out finished the job and two weeks later I get a bill for more than the bid.  They do very good work but need to evaluate their accounting practices and improve on the customer service.

name: Jennifer Roe
text: We’ve used Service Tech for our home and business since 1995. Our A/C unit reached the end of its life late on a Friday. The owner, Richie Vines, was here by 8am Saturday morning, two hours after we called. He got our unit working in 95 degree weather till we were able to replace it. We worked with sales, Steve Burns, who gave us numerous options for replacement. The installation technicians, Robert and Von, were incredibly professional and knowledgeable. We replaced both our A/C and furnace with Trane equipment. It’s completely solved our problem of hearing 2 floors with only 1 unit. The thermostat works from either the control pad or an app. Everyone in our family is really happy with the results and the service was outstanding!

resp.text: We are so glad that everyone in your family is happy. We will let Robert & Von know how well they did, as well as the owner Richie Vines. Service Tech, Inc. really values your feedback and looks forward to continuing the great relationship that we have established over the years. Warm regards, Team Service Tech, Inc.

name: George Stewart
text: I had my two heating systems inspected and maintained by a Service Tech technician. He brought with him a new preventive maintenance system with temperature meters that attached to return and supply registers which would feed an analysis software app on his phone and prepare a report for me. I have not yet received this report but was told that my cooling systems were okay ( not sure why this was done this time of year). He also told me that my upstairs thermostat was not working properly in heat mode and thought it might need to be replaced. I pointed out to him that is recently replaced as new in June 2020 and said that it was installed by my son at that time. We looked at the installation and he discovered that a wire jumper that powers the heating mode was missing. After helping him by holding a light to illuminate the terminal strip, he installed the jumper and the thermostat heating system came on.

resp.text: Thank you George for your review.  We appreciate your business.  Please contact us if you have any other issues.

name: robert bashinsky
text: The work was good and results were satisfactory. The crew was to rip out the damaged duct work, replace it and clean the HVAC unit. This was done, but the only complaints I had were they did not cover the vents and returns before the removal of the old moldy ducts. Thus the rooms became full of a moldy smell. They did stop and come cover the vents and returns, but they did not have any painters tape to apply to the walls. Fortunately I had some painters tape to loan to them. Other than those two lapses I had no complaints. The foreman was courteous and helpful and I would use Service Tech again if needed.

resp.text: Mr. Bashinsky, we apologize that we failed to cover the vents and returns initially. We are fortunate that you loaned us your painters tape. Team work makes the dream work, right??! Our team will pass this information on so that we have all of the supplies we need in the future. Your feedback has been quite helpful and we look forward to a continued business relationship with you. Sincerely, Team Service Tech, Inc.

text: DO NOT use this company! Now, we have water damage as well and he poured the WRONG FREON and also overloaded it. We are now having to buy an entire new system out of pocket due to our home warranty sending companies like this out and fix water damage out of our pocket! Also, they are completely unprofessional. For example, the owner of this branch was the technician as well that came out and he proceeded to take his shirt off and “work” while there was only a young woman in the house!! He was not the fittest either, very disturbing. Also, he new we have a small child too and he wouldn’t come out until it was convenient for him and complained about it every time we had to call to set up an appointment AGAIN because he lived 45 minutes away. PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!! (I don’t want to give them a star but it wouldn’t let me post this unless I did.)

resp.text: Your satisfaction is very important to us. We were not the first company and were not the last company to perform the multiple repairs for a world class home warranty that probably came with your new two bedroom home. Early 20's, gone through a divorce, very hard time, baby, then these multiple repairs before and after us. Glad you at least remembered us. But remember we fixed several issues before the next guys.

text: Did a great job nice folks Would definitely recommend

resp.text: Thanks for the review! Thankful for your business!

name: Kari George
text: Very professional, reasonably priced and knowledgeable. I would not use anyone else.

resp.text: Thanks Kari! We appreciate the review!

name: Janice Seale
text: We have used Carden Heating & Cooling for 20 years.  They do regular maintenance on our personal units as well as all our new home installs with our construction company.  When my mom’s old dinosaur finally died (after they patched it for years) I called & they came!  They were out the next day with a new unit & had her up & running.  Their customer service is 2nd to none.  From Sara & Amanda in the office to Simon & each of their highly trained technicians, thank you for a job well done!

resp.text: We truly appreciate your kind words. Thank you for your loyalty to our company!

name: Mike Austell
text:
We had a great experience with Carden Heating & Cooling!
We have always had a large Birmingham company service our unit and we weren't very impressed with their service group. So when it came time to get a new unit we started looking around. We had 6 different companies come quote our new system (large and small companies). We didn't stop our research there. Whenever possible I went and looked at a system each of those companies had installed to get an idea of the quality of their installers. I had never heard of Carden before,  but they came very highly recommend and after seeing their quality work and receiving the quote I understood why. We considered several of the quotes, but Carden offered a far superior unit at a better price than other quoted for a cheaper unit. They came and installed the unit the next business day and they did a phenomenal job. Kyle quoted our system and he was here for the install to make sure everything was taken care of just as we discussed. I can't say enough about the great job everyone at Carden did to take care of us. Carden will be the only company touching our system from now on.

resp.text: We are glad you found us Mike! Thanks for choosing Carden!

name: Jeffrey Roper
text: Everyone there is professional and knowledgeable. They have always arrived on time and I don’t have to worry about the quality of services. I will continue to use them.

resp.text: We appreciate your loyalty to Carden. Thanks Jeff!!

name: Robin Neal
text: Excellent customer service!  Excellent repairmen!  These guys were so polite and professional.  They treated me and my home with the utmost respect. Will definitely be calling them for all our HVAC needs

resp.text: Robin, Thank you for choosing Carden!

name: Donna Burnett
text:
Very Professional, Very pleased with everyone, from Simon, Brock and his crew
(Can't remember the names but they did introduced themselves. Maybe Jerry & Nathan) and the Ladies in the office. (Amanda) All seemed very knowledgeable in the profession. Job well done, will recommend to others.

resp.text: So glad you're happy with your new system Donna. Thank for choosing Carden to handle all your HVAC needs! We appreciate you so much!

name: Carolyn Seay
text:
Carden Heating and Cooling 😁😁😁.
I was having problems with my ac. It was Saturday morning around 6:00am. I sent an email and a voicemail. By 7:00am. I received a call from Amanda. Who was very sweet and very professional. She told me she would have someone out asap.

Simon arrived at 8:00am. He was very nice and introduced himself. He gave me instructions on what I needed  to do. I came outside and he had already diagnosed the problem. He told me that he had the part with him on site. He fixed it and he gave me detailed information about what to expect and the warranty time frame.

It was great quality work and service and reasonable price for an after hours service call. Will definitely use them for my maintenance.

Thank you again Carden Heating and Cooling!!!!

Carolyn S.

resp.text: We're so happy your experience went smoothly. Thank you for your kind words Carolyn!

name: Amanda Babcock
text: Friendly and helpful staff. They were able to come out quickly, and helped us with an issue we were having. They came recommended by someone who my family has used for years  to service their hvac. Nice to know who I can call if ever there is an issue, I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you Amanda for choosing Carden!

name: Terrence Shamburger
text: Great Service. Polite service techs. Explained the issue and the correction.

resp.text: We are glad to have your business! Thank you for the great review Terrence!

name: Ms QuickTrick
text: We have been fortunate enough to call on Carden for over 5 years now.  From one house to the new house and for our small business.  Every experience has been exemplary.  The technicians are courteous, timely and skilled.  The rates for service are always reasonable and the office staff is a pleasure to work with.  Thank you Carden, for being our champion over the years and into the future.

resp.text: Thank you Tess! Carden will always be here for you!

name: Paul Moody
text: Evaluated old unit and priced out a whole new system for my home. Carden also installed new returns with the install. They were not only competitive with pricing but the most friendly people I have ever worked with. They have installed my friends new unit as well and they couldn’t be happier with the Carden service and he feeling of being part of the family!

resp.text: You're definitely part of the Carden Family! We appreciate your business Paul!

name: Frank Couch
text: They installed a new system for my mother-in-law in the heat of July. They were prompt, courteous and helped her understand her new system.  Best of all they had her comfortable in a matter of hours after starting the job. The entire team makes you feel like you are part of their family.

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thank you Frank!

name: ashley serrano
text: We called them out for some maintenance on our AC ac and to repair some things..... our technician was very nice and respectful with dealing with more problems then we thought we had... however he arrived two hours late, didn’t have all the materials he needed to complete the job and had to come back a second day. The main complaint however is that we called them out with the specific request of cleaning our fins on the second day... when we asked about the fins being cleaned they said it would be too difficult and did not complete this request.... I will say we didn’t push this as we were wary of their ability to it if it was “to hard” but if it was easy I would have done it myself in the first place... what they did was good overall but it was a lot of work for us to have it done and that is not what I like to pay for.

resp.text: Ashley - I'm sorry that we fell short of your expectations.  We work really hard to provide 5 star service. Please call our office at 205-669-2459 and ask to speak to Simon.  We will do whatever it takes to make it right. Thanks - Simon

name: Ralph Ervin
text: They were lifesavers in the midst of one of the hottest days of the summer. Very detailed in helping me understand the issue and rapidly resolving it. Kyle was great! Thanks Carden Heating & Cooling!

resp.text: We appreciate your business Ralph! Thanks for the review!

name: Gary VanAtta
text: They are an incredible company! They are professional, hardworking and do quality work at a fair price. Amazing people! Great communication skills. They are truly a company that cares! Our main tech has been Cody! He’s knowledgeable, caring, hardworking... if there’s a problem, not only will he find it... he will fix it! Thanks to Harris and the company!!! GVA

resp.text: We're all aboard!! Thanks for choosing Carden!

name: Mike Olsen
text: This company came highly recommended by mechanical engineers in my office. Carden did not disappoint.  Very honest and knowledgeable. The Techs were friendly and professional.  I would highly recommend Carden.

text: The technicians were polite, they came out quickly, they called approx 30 min before arrival, and pricing seemed appropriate. I'd call them again in a minute.

name: James Fuqua
text: Great customer service. Use them for all our heating and cooling needs.

name: Kerry Kelly
text: I called about 10:30 a.m. on a horribly hot day, and Kyle was at my house by 3:00 p.m.  Issue was resolved quickly in a professional manner and AC was blowing wonderful cool air!  Kyle seemed to be very thorough, and explained things to me as he went along, which I appreciated.  Office staff was equally helpful and professional.  All in all, a very good experience and I will be calling them again for any HVAC needs.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Kelly! Thanks so much!

name: Donney Seale
text: We have used Carden Heating & Cooling since they opened their business in 2001.  We cannot say enough about Quality, Value, Professionalism, Responsiveness, & Punctuality!  We have to give them an A+ in all categories.  As an Alabama State Licensed Home Builder, they do all our new installs in the homes we build and they also service our personal units.  We recommend none other.  Give them a try, you won’t regret it!

resp.text: We truly appreciate your business! Thanks!

name: Debbie Cleveland
text: I would highly recommend this company to anyone having any heating or cooling needs. Simon and his team are very professional and always available in a time of crisis. They are very dependable and has the upmost professional integrity.

name: Ernesto Gonzalez
text: Carden Heating & Cooling have a very professional and knowledgeable staff and technitians. They were willing to come out to give me a second opinion at not cost they same day I called them. They repaired the AC and it's been working great. I'll definitely use them again.

name: E Pickett
text: Technicians were on time and very knowledgeable on how to service my a/c and heating.

name: Mita Desai
text: Great quick service! I have had a few times where it wasn't cooling. They came quickly to look at the problem.  They took great care of my situation and were able to identify and fix the problems.

resp.text: Thank you Mita, we appreciate your business!

name: Maryellen Peller
text: Carden , is the best bang for your buck, they are professional, caring, and will always be up front with what they are doing and what needs to be done. their prices are lower than most HVAC companies. They are the only ones I will use.

resp.text: We appreciate your loyalty Maryellen! Thanks!

name: Brenda Bush
text:
I switched to Carden heating and cooling after using a very large local company for many years. I called them for a second opinion
on replacing my heat pump (which previously mentioned company said I needed to do in order to keep cool the house) and I have not looked back since!  I have the same unit and they have been servicing it twice a year with my annual contract. The technicians are prompt and professional. I have been very happy with their service and I would highly recommend them!

resp.text: We're always here for you Ms. Brenda! Thanks!

name: Brice Phillips
text: Kyle was great - on time, professional, friendly, and efficient. Explained things thoroughly and offered opinions and suggestions but never a push to sell me more than I asked for. We’ve Carden for years and have always been very pleased!

resp.text: Thanks for your loyalty to us Brice!

name: Scott Crain
text: When my system was on the fritz in the middle of the summer and they came out and got everything up and running with an affordable solution. I had been previously told by another company that I’d have to replace the whole system. Got through that summer and still going strong! They’ll shoot you straight and won’t try to gouge you!

resp.text: Thank you Scott. So glad to have you as a customer!!

name: Mac Chandler
text: We had to have some work done on our Carrier Heating system. Called Carden and spoke with Amanda. She listened to our issues and set up an appointment for a few days later. She also texted me once the service tech departed their location for our home. The service tech, Kyle, was courteous, professional and assured us, after surveying the situation, that the work would be completed the same day. He coordinated for additional help, and the two other techs were just as courteous, knowledgeable, and professional.  Our issue was taken care of in a minimal amount of time, and they thoroughly cleaned up after their work. I highly recommend Carden Heating & Cooling.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind review. Glad to have you as a customer Mac!

name: Cassie Reeves
text: We had a situation with the air conditioner on a 100° day. I made a quick call to Carden Heating & Cooling and they were there in less than an hour. Kyle called to explain the issue and had already fixed it! Outstanding service and I would highly recommend this company. We will use them for life, no doubt.

resp.text: Thanks Cassie! We really appreciate your business!

name: Travis Bush
text: Their technician was very knowledgeable,professional and went the extra mile to do a great job. This was on a Sunday and was my A/c was fixed fast. Thanks

text: Replaced broken fan motor for air handler and installed new WiFi enabled thermostats. Great work.

text: I've been with Carden HVAC since 2015, and I must say, I am very satisfied and pleased with the service they have rendered thus far. Carden is found to be a very friendly and family-oriented business.

name: Ramona Rhodes
text:
I have used Carden Heating & Cooling for about 7 years and could not be more pleased. Simon and Amanda Carden do a great job making sure their customers receive superior service. Their technicians are knowledgeable, professional, and communicative. If you are interested in finding a this company that is honest, reliable, and reasonable, call Carden. Whether you need a new unit, repair of an aging unit, or a quality maintenance plan, they will take care of you. When I bought a new home just last week, I scheduled Carden on the day of closing to check out my system and begin a maintenance plan. I trust them and am so glad I found them!

Ramona Rhodes
Mt. Laurel in Birmingham, AL

resp.text: We really appreciate your business Ramona! Thanks for the review!

name: David Mcconnell
text: Service technicians were pleasant, efficient and nice to deal with.

resp.text: Thank you, we appreciate your business David!

name: Charles Miles
text: Sarah (on the phone) and Kevin (technician) were AWESOME!!!! They were at my house the same day I called ... in fact, they were done and we were up and running less than two hours after I initially called to report a problem with our HVAC!  Everyone I dealt with was professional and personable. As far as we are concerned, you’ve got a new customer for life! Thanks so much for helping us out!

resp.text: So glad to have you as a customer! Thanks for the review Charles!

name: Eva Williams
text: Highly recommend; fixed my problem. Detail oriented and courteous.

resp.text: We truly appreciate your business Eva! Thank you for leaving us a review.

name: Janice Blackmon
text: We were very impressed with the excellent service provided to us by Carden Heating & Cooling today. We called late on a Friday afternoon, but someone still came out and helped us with friendly and professional service. Now we have a working air conditioner for the weekend!

name: Jason McCay
text: Both of my interactions with Carden have been very positive ... with both the office and with the techs that visited my home. They're helpful, friendly to talk to, and solve the problem. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Jason! Thanks for choosing Carden!

name: Erik Hartwig
text: The service tech that showed up (Kyle) was knowledgeable and thorough.  He pointed out things to pay attention to and gave detailed recommendations regarding maintenance to ensure my systems longevity.  He was also very friendly.

resp.text: Glad to have you as a customer Erik! Thanks for the review!

name: John almond
text: The service technician was knowledgeable professional, polite and helpful.  I would absolutely recommend Carden Heating and cooling to friends and family!  The staff in the office are great also, they were very helpful working with my schedule setting up this annual check up.

resp.text: We appreciate your business John! Thanks!

name: Diana Statum
text:
Starting with office staff, Amanda was extremely kind on the phone, responsive to my needs and easy to work with.
Punctuality, the service man  a arrived exactly as promised and they called (as promised) to update on travel and arrival.
Service, the problem was diagnosed without question and was accurate. The parts were acquired within minimal Time and then installed immediately. Problem resolved, unit up and running. No mess left.
Service man, was extremely personable and professional. No bad language, no disrespect of person nor property (Especially since I had no idea what parts were even called nor their job). Showed me the problem the broken part and explained kindly how it affected the working (or lack there of) of the unit.  He even showed as much surprise as me to find a dead bluebird lodged in the motor! Only I can have a 500.00 bird Malfunction! Lol. Anyway, all considered, the cost of the part was the only stressful experience.  😊

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your business Diana! Thank you for taking the time to give us a review and such positive feedback.

name: Matt Burbank
text: Carden Heating and Cooling did a fantastic job installing our new AC system. They arrived at the time they said they would, and ensured that my system was functional before leaving. I would highly recommend them to anyone that needs HVAC assistance. I now see why they were such highly rated.

resp.text: Thanks Matt, we appreciate your business!

name: Crystal Smith
text: I have had my share of experience with HVAC companies & these guys are the best! They are super quick. I received service w/in an hour of my call & they are very professional, pleasant, & courteous. Thank you Carden!

resp.text: Thanks for the review Crystal! We appreciate your business!

name: Jonathan Barber
text:
We had a problem with the heating system in lake home we just purchased.  On recommendations from several others, I called Carden.  The office staff was responsive and set an appointment.  The tech (Kyle) was on time and even called to let me know he was on his way.  He was polite, efficient, certainly very knowledgeable and quickly completed the repairs.  He answered a lot of questions I had on the heat pump and made recommendations for future maintains.
I could not be happier.  I will be calling Carden for summer service and for all repairs and replacements with my HVAC.  So refreshing to get good service,  no, excellent service.  I highly recommends these folks.
Jonathan

resp.text: Jonathan, we are so glad you found us on Facebook! We appreciate your business!!

name: Kathy Parrish
text: The technician was very professional and very thorough in his maintenance inspection. The maintenance agreement is reasonable. I will definitely renew when it is time.

resp.text: Thanks Kathy, we appreciate your business!

name: Katherine Moore
text: Kyle and his partner came out and diagnosed the problems quickly.  They were very professional and not pushy.  I am glad we used them!

resp.text: We are happy to have you as a customer Katherine! Thanks for the review!

name: Kelly Parker
text: Cardenas Heating and Cooling were very nice, professional and we had a very great experience with them. I will be using them for all our A/C issues!

resp.text: We are glad to have you as a customer!! Thanks for the review Kelly!

name: Kaylan Cannon
text: Carden Heating & Cooling did a great job to inspect our unit properly. The technician was on time and very polite. Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thanks for calling us for your HVAC needs!

name: Cindy Salser
text: We used Cardens to replace a 13 year old unit that had gone out. The technician was very professional and explained what was going on and gave us options. We could have replaced the outside unit only but we chose to replace the entire unit since it was so old. I like that we were not told we needed an entire unit when we didn’t, but were given the option to choose for ourselves. It’s hard to find honest HVAC companies and I have dealt with some that weren’t but I feel that Cardens is very honest and dependable. I highly recommend them and will use them again in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Carden. We appreciate your business Cindy!

name: Melinda Calderini
text: The consistent, excellent service by the professionals at Carden Heating & Cooling have been my go to team for almost a decade! When I have been at my wits end with a broken HVAC unit, they have done everything possible to get to my house help me out fast!! Each staff member is so kind and trustworthy! I can't thank them enough!!!

resp.text: Thank you Melinda, we appreciate your business!!

name: Woody Quinn
text:
Carden Heating & Cooling did a complete change out on our old home built in 1843. They installed all new duct work and new units and had it completely finished in one day! What they did made our old home feel and smell like a new home, and our power bill has tremendously gone down this summer.  The difference is amazing!

We've used Carden Heating and Cooling for over twenty years.  I highly recommend them for their knowledge, efficiency, fair pricing, and strong work ethic!

resp.text: Thank you to the Quinn’s for your kind words! We’re blessed to have such great customers!

name: Terrell Carmichael
text: Maintenance guy was nice and respectful to my children.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review Terrell. We appreciate your business!

name: Jesse riding

text: I am very impressed with the technician who came to my house.. He took his time checking everything out and he was very patient with me in explaining what he did to correct the issue.

name: Mike C
text: Carden Heating and Cooling is excellent and I would highly recommend them to anyone needing their HVAC system serviced. I have used them multiple times and every service call has been outstanding!

name: Julie Gilmore
text: They were fast and efficient and came when the said they would be there.  The gentleman knew exactly what was wrong with it within a few minutes and had my air fixed within a few minutes.  Plus their prices are very reasonable.  I would highly recommend using this company.

text: We have been extremely pleased with the work Carden Heating and Cooling has done for us. We would not go anywhere else for service to our heat and air!

resp.text: We really appreciate your business Art!!

name: Sheryl L
text: When we had a concern with our new unit, Carden was quick to calm our worries and come check out our unit. They called to make sure that we were going to be home and then showed up right when they said they would. Definitely recommend Carden for all your heating and cooling needs.

resp.text: Thanks so much Sheryl.

name: Kirk Colburn
text: Carden Heating and Cooling was a true delight to work with!  We are moving to a new location and I told the buyer of my home that I would have the AC serviced. Sarah in the office set my appointment for a Thursday morning at 9am.  Kyle (technician) shows up at 8:55.  This guy’s was truly a pros pro. He looked at everything from intake to outtake with a microscope! Blew out the lines, replaced some loose vent pipes, and charged with a couple pounds of Freon. As well as cleaned everything! This guy was the best!  Not to mention it was all done at a super reasonable cost.  These two 24 year old units will now run you out of the house it gets so cold.  I can honestly say, if your using anyone other than Carden, your only cheating yourself.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review and such positive feedback. We greatly appreciate your business!

name: Rachel Reddell
text: Carden Heating and Cooling is a fun, loving, family, friendly run business. I have know them for a very long time and there is nothing they want do to meet your needs. Call on them today! Love you guys!

resp.text: Thank you Rachel! Thankful for great customers & friends like the Reddell’s! Love y’all!

name: Bill Presson
text: We’ve been so happy with the work that Carden did installing the HVAC in our new home in 2018 and with the follow up/fine tune visits they’ve made since then. The annual maintenance program is well worth the price. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Bill. Thanks for the review.

name: Mike West
text: I have always had great service from Carden Heating and Air. Their service people are very polite and knowledgeable. Above all I trust their advice about my units. Hard to find in this business.

resp.text: Thanks Mike! We appreciate your business!

name: Marie Johnson
text: Have been using Carden Heating and Cooling for a while now and have never been disappointed in their service. They are friendly and professional. Would recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Carden! We appreciate your business Marie!

name: Avery Rhodes Akins
text:
I am a loyal Carden customer...I should probably get a t-shirt!!!  The Carden team services my two homes as well as the homes of the clients who rent homes from me.  The communications team is always kind, helpful, knowledgeable, and organized when I need to schedule a Carden visit.  The ground team is friendly, knowledgeable, and offers very high quality workmanship for very fair prices.  The entire team is great at explaining technical issues that are often beyond what I know and understand about HVAC systems!

Carden has been able to capably fix every heating and cooling issue that I or one of my rental clients has ever had.  One particular issue was pretty involved and complex in an older home this past summer, where, due to a prior installer doing shoddy work, my client was unable to cool her home and was receiving sky-high bills.  The Carden Team came in and fixed the entire system and duct work, and her bill has gone down by HUNDREDS of dollars!!

One final note, and this may make me favorite thing about the Carden family:  I work with a vulnerable, low-income community, and it is often difficult to hire service workers to come into the communities where we need things fixed.  I have actually had service workers tell me directly that they would not service one of my clients’ homes due to their address.  It is heartbreaking.  Carden has never made my clients or me feel like they were not good enough.  They come, with a smile on their faces, prepared to do good work every time for every person.  That’s good business and good leadership.  Thank you Carden...you’ve got me forever in your corner!!

resp.text: It’s customers like you that keep our business growing. We are thankful to have your family as customers and friends!

name: Joyce Lilly
text: Carden Heating and Cooling is a GREAT business and HONORS their commitment to their customers.  We are VERY PLEASE with them!!!!

resp.text: We enjoy doing business with you Joyce. Thank you for choosing Carden!

name: Sarah Carter
text: I’ve been using Carden for almost 10 years. They are very responsive and do quality work.

resp.text: Thanks for your loyalty to our company!

text: I highly recommend Carden Heating & Cooling!  They are always prompt, courteous and thorough. We are on their semi-annual maintenance agreement and love it!  No more having to remember to call for maintence!  Try them you won't be disappointed .

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Pam! We are thankful for customers like you and Mr. Glenn!

text: On-time polite good value for the money. I will use them again.

text: I have been using them for almost a decade now for my HVAC services and repairs. They are always on time and very quick to respond to any issue. They are absolutely the best. I would recommend them above anyone.

name: Robert Parrish
text: I just wanted to say that Carden Heating and air was very quick and professional! They showed up at my house within an hour that I called!  The tech was clean cut and very organized as well!! I strongly recommend this company to anybody that needs some A/C repair needs! Thanks guys for the great experience !

resp.text: Thank you Robert! We appreciate your business!

name: Bobbie W
text: Very fast and great service. I will always use this Company for my heating and air conditioning needs. Courteous and very polite.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Bobbie. We appreciate your business!

name: Robert Nilsen
text: A five star experience. We were without a/c for two weeks when we called. They responded immediately and verified the info another company gave us. They were the least expensive of the chices and the team that Kyle led was quick and first class. Imagine having your indoor and outdoor heat pump systems exchanged in a half a day! HIghest marks!!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Nilsen, we appreciate your business!

name: Clint Foster

name: Michael Blackwood
text:
They came and performed warranty repairs to our a/c compressor, fixed in lightning speed. We had been waiting two weeks for the company that installed the new HVAC in our home (Buckner plumbing and heating) to come service the unit and after six calls to them in which they promised to be coming that day and then had an excuse each and every time why they weren't coming. They went so far as to tell us they don't money in warranty repairs, even when we had an extended warranty for 13 years. They told me to call someone else to come and do the repairs. The catch in all this was that our extended warranty covered both parts and labor. If we had to go to a different Trane dealer they would not cover the labor costs, but the parts were at no charge. I read several good reviews about Carden and decided to go with them. Our repairman was by far one of the most professional, kind and courteous people we have ever had the pleasure of working with. They gave us an estimate before hand and I had already checked the average labor costs to change the compressor out and their rate was very reasonable. Upon finishing the job and it came time to settle up with and to my amazement they came over five hundred dollars cheaper than the original estimate. HVAC has been running around the clock to keep our house at 62 degrees around the clock. I can't tolerate heat due to a medical condition. They called us a few days later to just in in to make sure it's still running great.

It's now over a month since they fixed and I got an email just to check on us, which I truly appreciated. It's is running all the time to keep the house in an arctic deep freeze.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We appreciate your business!

name: Debbie Glasgow
text: I would not trust anyone else the way I trust Carden. They are prompt and HONEST!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Debbie. We appreciate you!

name: Ms. Brittany
text: They were nice, professional, and arrived on time. This is why they earned two stars. However, I hired them to do winter maintenance and to tell me what was wrong with my units. I was talked into buying a starter kit for over 250 bucks which I later found out typically cost significantly less. This was for my upstairs unit which did not work. I ended up spending 3 times more than what I wanted to and my units still didn’t perform well. I was also told that I would be contacted with warranty information on my units which never happened. I understand that businesses have to make a profit but I still can’t help but feel taken advantage of.

resp.text:
Hi Ms. Brittany,
I'm sorry to hear that you feel like you've been taken advantage of.  We pride ourselves on being upfront and honest in every circumstance.  I've made it a point to put my customers best interest before my own for over 20 years.  Please call our office at 669-2459 and ask for Simon.  I'd be glad to go over your invoice and answer any questions you have.
Thanks!
Simon Carden, Owner

I truly felt like he wouldn't lead us in a wrong direction. We ended up needing to replace our unit, but I felt like the quote was a very fair. Installation could not go any smoother either.

All that to say, if you want fast, honest, fair pricing on HVAC work - call Carden today.

name: Casey Vinson
text: Called these folks the morning after my heat went out in the middle of the night. Explained that I have a disabled child in my home and needed someone to come out and get us up and running. The lady seemed really nice and symapathetic. After taking my name, number, address and email, she assured me someone would call me back in “just a little while” to schedule a time to come out. Never heard back from them at all. I understand if they were unable to help me out. My issue is the lack of communication. I placed several calls to several other companies. All of which at least tried to or told me if they could not help. Affordable Heating & Cooling is the only company that never bothered to call me back. Hats off to D ’n A Heating & Air for going out of their way to help us.

resp.text: We apologize that we missed your call Casey Vinson. Our staff has been working around the clock, so your call was directed to our answering service. We are sorry your call fell through the cracks. Looking over the notes from our answering service we have no recorded mention of a disability call, we try to prioritize no heat calls depending on the severity starting with young children and the elderly. As a company we aim to return calls to all our clients even if we cannot handle their issue to at least direct them to another solution. Once again we are sorry for not being able to return your call during this hectic time and are happy that you were able to solve your issue. Please accept a free maintenance check up on us.  If you would like text me(Scott) personally.  706-332-9880.

name: David Holt
text:
I have two 15 year old Trane heat pumps in my home. I am planning to completely renovate both systems in the next 12 months because I know that equipment like this only lasts 12 to 15 years, even when you keep it professionally maintained like we do.

Unfortunately, one of the compressors died and it makes no sense to repair it but I am not quite ready to invest in the new equipment just yet. I called Affordable and was told they could install a temporary cooling system to get us through the next few weeks while we get our renovation plans and money together.

In less than 4 hours, the Affordable team had the temporary cooling unit up and running! The house is already 3 degrees cooler and feeling great!

I really like that these guys look out for your safety, health, comfort, and lifetime efficiency.

Affordable for life!

Highly Recommended!

Our both our heat and air went out at the same time this Winter, and having Lupus and Raynaud's disease (causes some areas of my body such as your fingers and toes to feel numb and cold in the slightest of cool environments), it became very uncomfortable very fast.

Having been in customer service for over 25yrs, I consider customer service experience a "deal" or "deal-breaker" from the moment a representative greets me. A representative (Chris) arrived early the next morning, and with a smile no less! He was very knowledgeable about various products, professional (masked and wearing shoe covers), patient and caring about our situation. He assured me that Stability Mechanical would exhaust every option to assist us, and that's just what they did! Not only did he and "Kam" (in office rep) work hard together to get us financed, but the actual owner briefly joined them on the phone and encouraged them to work with our budget to at least get the "heat" working. It was then, that I knew we had the best of Birmingham! But, that was not all. They were able to get us financed for and entire new HVAC Unit within our budget!

Daniel and Drew were both very pleasant and very knowledgeable, as they answered every question I had. Together they installed a new HVAC unit in our home on Friday. Based on my experience with Stability Mechanical, the above ratings are accurate!  Thank you (Chris, Kam, Daniel, Drew, Turk and of course Joe).

name: Mindy Moore
text: This company is exceptional in service, quality, and follow-up.  We have had a hiccup or two but it was mostly due to the way the house is built.  Joe, the owner, came out and made sure that EVERYTHING was great!!!  Would recommend to everyone looking for ac work.

name: Leelee Gaissert
text: Chris was very polite and knowledgeable he explained everything we would be needing in detail.

name: Kelsey Rocco
text: We received quotes from several other plumbing companies. Stability beat all of them and fixed our problem in 15 min. Will definitely call them again if we have any other problems.

name: Katie Broach
text:
My husband and I have used Stability on multiple occasions. Every time they come out to our house it's nothing but a wonderful experience. Tylor and Craig installed a new hot water heater tonight and they were so awesome.
I am the type of person that has to watch and ask questions. They both were very patient and answered my questions throughly. Highly recommend giving them a call if you ever have a problem!! Thanks guys!! Y'all were great!!!

name: botcwc1
text: Honest guys that do great work. Definitely able to diagnose the issue and take care of it quickly. Very satisfied will use them again :-)

name: Leigh Davis
text: Stability provides excellent service with professional, knowledgeable service people. I would recommend them for all of you heating/AC needs. Very reasonable prices and quality work. My family would not even consider using any other company.

name: Christie Estes
text: No homeowner wants to come home to find that the AC isn't working. Particularly not in June in Alabama. Last year, my upstairs AC unit went out.  The guys from Stability came out promptly and evaluated the situation. They explained why I needed a new unit. They also explained why it made more financial sense to go ahead and replace the unit. They could have suggested putting a band aid on it for a temporary fix only to have to ultimately replace it. And that might have worked--maybe even a few times. And it would have been profitable for them to "fix" it a few times before replacing the unit. However, these guys are honest and ethical. If you don't need it, it will not be suggested. I was able to get a nicer unit than what I had for a reasonable price that is far more energy efficient than what I had. It was also nice to do business with a local company. When you call, you get to speak to an actual person. The Stability guys will show up on time and get the job done promptly. They are polite and courteous as well. I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Gabriella Satterberg
text:
Our AC went out 2 days after coming home with a newborn. We called Joe and his team and they were able to come out and troubleshoot the issue. They then went out of their way to track down and go pick up the part needed so they could fix the issue that day rather than order and wait for it to come in.
I definitely recommend them for your HVAC needs!

name: Beth Nixon
text: I highly recommend Stability to anyone needing service, repairs or a new unit. They had the best prices of everyone that I contacted, they are extremely professional and make you feel like family. If you want the BEST prices and service, please call Stability because I promise you will not be disappointed!!

name: Hunter Echols
text: Stability Mechanical replaced our air conditioning unit and did a wonderful job! The staff was extremely knowledgeable and professional, and the prices couldn't be beat! I would highly recommend using them!

text: Always great work at a reasonable price!!

text: Joe and his team do a wonderful job! They are always professional and honest. I highly recommend them!

text: Stability Mechanical is a great resource for those young professionals in Tuscaloosa who are just starting out - buying a home or starting a business. Numerous YP(t) members have used Stability Mechanical and were very happy with their services.

name: michael nixon
text: Stability is a top notch heating and air company. They are extremely knowledgable and very affordable. They provide some of the best prices, service and warranties in the business. And best of all, they are family owned and treat you like family. I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Danielle Shilling
text: I  am beyond impressed with the work, equipment and customer service from Stability Mechanical!  Awesome company for anyone needing HVAC concerns addressed! I love my new system , thanks Michael Nixon and all of Stability Mechanical!  👏👍

text: Joe and his guys provide great service at really affordable prices. They also had the best warranty out of everyone I called. And best of all, we didn't have to come out of pocket for the new system. We were able to finance it through our power bill! I would recommend them to anyone.
