name: Don Frezell
text:
Had a Tune up done on my 23 yr. Old Trane unit and asked for a estimate on a new larger system. Tech did all the measurements and told me they would get back by email with some options. Never heard a word back. Ended up getting estimate from Country Boyz and 3D Air that I received the same day. 3D AIR INSTALLED a new system 2 days later. I had heard good things about Stability Mechanical and was ready to buy from them but they dropped the ball on this sale!

Thank you for replying.

name: Selena Harrison
text:
Stability Mechanical will take care of your HVAC needs. They are fast and thorough HVAC experts.

Our system was not cooling properly right when high temps hit. Joe and his team were at our house within a couple of hours and presented THREE solutions. We have not had one problem since they came out and now rest assured everything will be in working order as the seasons change with their service agreement.

Do not hesitate to call Stability Mechanical for all your HVAC, plumbing and gas services!

name: Dee
text: Very prompt service and very professional.  I would definitely recommend them.

name: Jen G
text: Quick service and reasonable price.  Thanks much!

name: Sl McK
text:
We have home warranty through American Home Shield. Of course they sent Myers, (which we've never had a good experience with Myers)  to inform us we needed a new coil and some freon. We knew our coil was covered and then the freon that was not covered by AHS was estimated about $125. AHS called us, Myers sent in we also needed to have a total duct work adjustment which was $890 not covered by warranty. Myers never told us about needing a complete duct work adjustment.

I call Stability Mechanical​ after hearing great reviews for a second opinion. Next day they were here and gave us a free inspection. Yes, we needed the coil and freon, but not a total duct work adjustment. They were back in two days and had the air fixed quickly. I will add, they were able to fix the air that day, but I needed to file a form with AHS to get a very little partial reimbursed.

We have not had one problems with the air since then. What we were going to be out of pocket having what home warranty did not cover was the same amount we paid Stability Mechanical. This was a realization to us  paying $60 a month for AHS warranty and a $75 service fee was a rip off.

Joe, the owner of Stability Mechanical could not have been nicer, as well as his employees. We are not from this area, so it was so GREAT to find a company that was honest in telling us what exactly we needed, and not adding things we didn't need. I will never use another company for our AC/Heat issues.

name: Kathleen Claybrook
text: Great company!  Rescued us from a leaking water heater!

name: Mark Black
text: They do my maintenance are on time are they will call good people good price

name: Cody Boos
text: Ive been with them for over a year. Love my job and the people i work with. Its a family atmosphere and they treat us with respect and you feel valued as a employee .

name: Phillip Fikes
text: Very fast and great prices! Will definitely be using them from now on.

name: Adam Steele
text: Done a great job and a fair price !

name: ChopinLover
text: Very professional with great value

name: J316
text: A year or so ago I had them replace my gas furnace under my house. They installed a MayTag unit that has an incredible warranty period. I like the unit so far with zero issues and the installation was done very well. They seem like good folks. Today a friend had them come out and repair her outside airconditioner. Phil was very knowledgeable, thorough and nice, did a great job. I would highly recommend these folks for and repairs or installation you may have.

name: Latonya Bell
text: We Scheduled them twice because they did not show up on time nor did they call & say they were going to be late . I work and don’t sit at home all day so a courtesy call would have been appreciated , never using again !

name: Debi Goodman
text: We have used Hans Heating & Air for a number of years. They were recommended to us by a friend when we were new to the area. They have always been honest, professional and reliable. When our AC died 8 years ago, they were honest and said that our inside unit was only 3 years old and didn't have to be replaced. So they just replaced the needed section and saved us thousands. We have them do preventative maintenance twice a year. Have never had any problems. They are on time, friendly and very thorough. Highly recommend.

name: Tad Wildman
text:
SCAM ALERT!  The technician concluded that my blower motor was bad in my furnace. I agreed with him.  He said that no one had ever registered my unit for warranty when they installed it. So nothing was covered under warranty.

To install the new blower motor was going to be $1900 or they would gladly finance a new furnace unit for me to the tune of $3400.  Of course — with a great warranty!!

***Only the faulty motor WAS under warranty and I had it replaced for free by another company that doesn’t purposefully screw their customers!***

BEWARE their word can’t be trusted!

name: Vernalisa Bruce
text: My parents had them install a brand new unit in one area of their home. They also had them replace a coil in another unit. They have been out three times at least to service the new unit in the last 18 months to 2 years. The new coil also went out and it's less than 2 years old. Although the coil is still under warranty, it is a tremendous burden for 81 year olds. My mother said she would never ever use them again. The service people are very polite and have never given us a problem in that area. However , it seems they use substandard equipment in their installations and repairs. Once they ordered a part or one of the units and it took months for it to arrive. As a matter of fact we had to call and inquire and at our inquiry, she realized that it had come in and they hadn't even contacted us. So I cannot recommend them at this time.

name: brad jackson
text: Took the offer the tune-up and it was a very pleasant experience. Very professional to setup and the tech arrived on time. Matt answered all my questions and helped me figure out why my power bill was increasing so much more than previous summertimes. Highly recommend Han's. Thanks.

name: J Johnson
text: After experiences with three different HVAC companies this summer, I have decided that I will always call Hans first from now on. I had an obvious problem with my AC system, and two other companies came out and charged me, only to do nothing and say they couldn't find the problem. I called Hans for a third opinion and the guys located the problem and then fixed it for a very reasonable price. An animal had chewed a hole into a duct line. I mentioned this situation to a friend and she also told me that she had had great experiences with Hans in the past. They seem to operate by the old standard - give great customer service to build customer loyalty. The other guys at the other businesses operate on the newer model - charge as much as possible for each visit no matter what happens.

name: Terrence Johnson
text:
The worst company in the Montgomery area. They attempted to charge me $949.00 to install a fan motor for my outside unit. I called Chad's Heating and Air and they replaced it for $400.00 cheaper, with a 2 year warranty. Please do not use this corrupt company. Just imagine how many people (especially the elderly) have scammed to make a profit. Don't waste your time calling these people, because they are nothing but crooks.

I talked with the service desk lady on the phone, and she advised me that they charge a "flat rate" regardless of the issue you have.

name: Lewis J
text:
They have great knowledgeable technicians however, I purchased two brand new units from them almost a year ago and the condensor has already gone out on one them. I called them on Saturday to get the unit serviced. The technician determine that the problem was the condenser and was informed that they're unable to fix issue until the new part arrives sometime next week. Until then I'm stuck without air.

I asked about a portable air unit or window unit to get through until it can be resolved. After speaking with a manager, I was informed that there is absolutely nothing they can do on their very end. Most companies at least have a portable unit they can loan you until the service is completed (I checked with Dixie and they have some along with a couple of other companies). Even though it's currently almost 87 degrees and climbing inside (93 degrees outside).

name: Eddie Edwards
text: I've used Han's for several years.  They replaced my evaporator and condenser, furnace, and fan.  The one warranty call I've had in the past was responded to immediately.  Same day service and no cost warranty service.  Today I had a tune-up/maintenance check on my HVAC.  Daniel inspected the system and found and replaced a weak capacitor.  All part of the normal tune-up cost.  I would recommend them to family and friends without hesistation.

name: RDT 64
text: Gas leak in the HVAC closet.  A rep was onsite within an hour and his repair crew was onsite and the problem fixed less than 2 hours after the phone call.

name: Chris Fraley
text: I have Americas Preferred home warranty and they let me pick my contractor, that's where the good ends for them. Hans team went above and beyond to work with the most uncooperative home warranty company on the face of the Earth. They also provided great and super fast work (once I gave up on the warranty company). Their tech Brandon was very knowledgeable and down to earth even at 9pm. I will definitely be using them again in the future for both my home and my business.

name: Janet Kissane
text: ALWAYS ON THE JOB!  The nicest and most professional people@

name: Dave McKinney
text: I’ve used HANS for a number of years. The work is always been done professionally. And their warranty work has been superb.

name: seein visionz
text: My experience with this company has been great. The techs are very professional and knows their job.

name: Monique puig-garcia
text: Always awesome!!

name: Allen Patterson
text: I have been doing business with these people through many name changes and applications since 1977. Since I'm still doing business with these people should tell you all you need to know. A good business relationship is hard to come by these days ! Take pride in having one !

name: sara rizzo
text: They are very professional and always nice and quick. Thanks

name: Martha Grubb
text: I had a great experience with several employees at Hans. A young man came to do the spring check up on my system. He found a large amount of Freon had leaked out. He explained everything to me and explained my options. When I told him that I would like to confer with a family member who has worked in air conditioning and heating before making a decision, he understood and agreed to talk to the family member to explain everything.  I made the decision to purchase a new unit and the supervisor arranged to have a crew come the same afternoon. Two young men installed the unit. They were very professional and answered all my questions. They made sure that I understood how to use the thermostat correctly before they left—and the bill was exactly what the first employee had said it would be. I would highly recommend this company for heating and cooling work.

name: Breannan Dunkerson
text: We used Hans to fix some previous issues with our A/C unit so when it started having issues again, they were the company that I called. Becky #1 went above and beyond by helping me troubleshoot the issue before sending someone out to my house. My husband was at work and I was not sure what to do. She walked me through the steps and I'm so thankful for her helpfulness and friendliness! We asked for a tech to come out and Jay came to our home. He was professional and friendly too! After he left, we had one additional question and called after business hours. We asked the answering service if Jay could call us back and he did within 5 minutes. We ended replacing our unit. It was replaced by Chris and Zach. These guys were super friendly and knowledgable. We will never use another A/C company besides Hans. Thanks Hans! You're the best around!

name: Hobbs HVAC
text: We have been to their facilities twice now very nice and knowledgeable individuals that get the job done.

name: Ginger McMurry
text: Very polite, made sure I understood options.  Explained the condition in terms that I could understand. Would highly recommend!

name: Katie and Kevin
text: They came out “serviced” my AC unit and told me it hasn’t been cleaned out in a VERY LONG TIME. Thought it was funny considering they came out last year to “clean” it. The guy cleaned it for me and left me with a big bill. My AC was still acting the same as if he had done no work to my AC at all. Called them back out and the guy pretty much told me no matter what I do it probably won’t make a difference. That would have been nice to know before I paid you guys a bunch of money to “fix” it. The guy said I needed to just let it run it’s course and then eventually get it replaced. My AC unit was installed in 2012. My house almost gets to 80 degrees and I was told that was normal.

name: Kitty Harris
text: On time,  every time.  Becky is great to work with my crazy schedule and reschedule.

name: April Kendrick
text: Technicians Cash, Hunter and James were VERY helpful and informative and willing to ensure a clear understanding was provided. Ms. Becky was very helpful with setting the appointment and answering my questions.

name: Ric Willingham
text: Hans Heating & Air Conditioning installed our AC and furnace maybe 10 or so years ago and it has given us zero problems. I installed a smart thermostat just before Christmas that required I install an adapter on the control board due to lack of a "C" wire. While the heater kept us toasty this winter it wasn't until a few warm days recently that we discovered the lack of cool air. I called Hans Heating & AC early morning and by the time I got home from work they had us chilling. The very nice young man, according to my wife, discovered in short order my wiring error and I was very pleased with the reasonable cost of the service. We will always rely Hans Heating & AC for our comfort.

name: Terry Montgomery Ramsey
text:
The gentlemen who came to my home for a tuneup were exceptionally proficient and professional. Jay and Kevin cleaned the outside unit so that it looked brand new. I pointed out to them some sticks around the vent on the roof. Jay and Kevin disassembled the pipe leading to the inside unit. The pipe contained sticks and other debris. While not affecting the ac, this would definitely be a dangerous hazard when heat would be needed for colder weather.

These young men cleaned the entire pipe leading to the roof. They also were able to remove the sticks and such from the roof. These professionals definitely went above and beyond to make certain that our heat and a.c. were working properly.

I would definitely recommend Hans Heating and Air to those who are looking for quality and excellent service!

name: Steve Jackson
text: We called Hans when we needed service in 2007 and were very happy with them. Over the years since, they’ve regularly done tuneups on our systems and replaced some when they failed. The employees we’ve dealt with were always friendly and courteous and very professional!

name: El Jones
text: Techs are always professional and explain what they are doing and how it will help.

name: Chris Germann
text: Hans heating and air did a great job and gave me a great deal. Technicians were efficient and very professional. My power bill has been reduced approximately $40 per month. I would definitely use them again in the future!!

name: Carol Ballard
text: Very reliable professional agents with the company.

name: Mark
text:
These folks are the real deal. First used them over a Labor Day Holiday weekend several years ago when our original system died. They had a new system in and running in about 48 hours. Now they do my semi-annual tune-ups and keep my system running efficiently.

Won't trust my system to anyone else.

name: Danita R.
text: Called them, and within 10 minutes the Technician was pulling up to my house!!! #now that's service!!!

name: Kathryn Chapman
text: These guys were awesome. At first we thought we would have to invest a lot in a repair. Our service man called his supervisor for a second opinion and we were repaired for just $69.00. As an established customer, they were at our house within a half hour of my call. Very professional!!!

name: Marcus Shumack
text: I have used them several times and they have always been professional and customer service oriented. On one occasion they took my complaint direct to the manufacturer and obtained and additional discount. AC if needed is always expensive but I have found them to be reasonable on price and quick to respond.

name: Joe joe G
text: Called for repairs and arrived within two hrs

name: Brady Simpson
text: Awesome service,  the seasoned technician walked me through his findings, the root causes and went over options.  I received top notch service and knowledge on general air conditioning systems and how to maintain my unit to prevent any further failures. I highly recommend this company !!!

name: Pamela Hughes
text: I have used Hans for many years. When I built my first home 2 years after moving in the A.C. stopped working. I called Hans and they came out and found a problem the initial I installation team shoiuld have taken care of. They fixed it and kept it up for another 12 years. Their technicians are always professional and kind. I won't use anyone else.

name: Callie Hincy
text: Andy did a great job on my tune-up! Very thorough and explanatory about the status of my system. Would highly recommend!

name: Liz Lewis
text: They stand behind their warranty and were quick to replace

name: Amy Strickland
text: Excellent service and excellent products. Have used this company for over 10 years

name: Barnetta Beasley
text: Jay was very knowledge of his job. I will recommend him again and again.  He was very polite to get the job done.

name: David Wilder
text: We are very happy with luquire heating and air their representatives have always been efficient courteous and professional I recommend them highly

name: Judy Powell
text: We have been customers for several years and have always received quick and knowledgeable service.  Their tune-up service has saved us money several times as they have repaired our units using the warranty they provide.

name: Gwen Allen-Smith
text: Hans Heating and Air have been courteous and responsive each time I have needed them to service my unit. They have been punctual and if the were running late I was notified.

name: P Diddy
text: They arrived late, the  technician looked at the indoor and outdoor unit in thirty minutes then asked for payment. The outdoor coils was not cleaned as the said they would when I scheduled the service. There was NO preventive maintenance done except the filter replacement that I do myself.  If you are expecting a receipt of any kind at the time you hand over the payment, it's all "electronic" now you will have to wait for it in the mail or they will email you one. (He had no paper receipt in his truck) When I call the office to inform them of the service (the lady didn't bother to identify her position there) she already knew the technician was late and offered excuses because of the rain. Does anyone have a job that you have to be on time regardless if it's raining? She defended the lack of preventive maintenance stating it will do more harm than good to the unit.   Poor customer service. Keep your money in your pocket because this service is not worth what they charges.  This was the first time I didn't follow a technician around to insure the work is done. My advice when dealing with Hans Heating & Air Conditioning, get the work to be preformed in writing before they start and follow them the entire time the are there to insure they do the work.  Since everything is electron, tell them to bill you.

name: Katie Ufford
text: Service man was on time and checked out my system thoroughly.  He was very courteous.

name: Samuel Tullis
text: A Top-Notch Organization, 5-Star Professionals who know the importance of operating with nothing less than Excellence!

name: Patrick Lavin
text: I have used Hans (and, it’s predecessor), for over 30 years. Sadly, we will be moving, to Atlanta; where, I can, only, hope to find a company as RELIABLE and COMPETENT, as Hans.

name: Fred Zeigler
text: Efficient, helpful, courteous people who strive to meet your needs, answer your questions, and work to install, repair, and keep your products and systems in excellent working condition.

name: Tobias Grant
text:
I have worked with this company twice over the past year.  Once in June 2017, when my children and I were returning home from Texas late to fiind a very hot house with no Air Conditioning.  I did an emergency information pull, discovered them and they came and repaired the fried current breaker first thing the following morning.  The tech even worked with me to allow my children and me to retrieve the new circuit breaker while he ran a new lenght of wire, allowing me to reduce the overall cost of the repair and to get done the same day.

The following time happened  around the 19th of February.  I was getting a simple seasonal HVAC repair when it was discover that the evaporator coil was leaking freon, was significantly rusted at the bottom, and had to be immediately replaced if I wanted to try to eke out more life out of my now probably damaged air conditioning condenser.  Long story short, I went from that state at 9:00 to having a new evaporator installed, and system fully ready to go by around 11:30.   It wasn't cheap at $1900 dollars, but that included my 10% military discount, and again, it was completed in 2 1/2 hours .  I definitely intend to use them again.

name: David Hyman
text:
First Rate Company.  Every service tech from Hans that has visited my home has been knowledgeable and courteous and they really care about the service they provide.  Over the past 20 years in the Montgomery area I've used many different Heating and Air companies, but none have compared to Hans.  I now use them exclusively as I know I can count on a quick response and quality workmanship.

The last service I had from them I called at about 4:00 PM and fully expected a service call for the next day.  They said they would have someone out shortly (It only took 30-45 minutes) and the problem was fixed in about 10 minutes after his arrival.  The Tech didn't stop there, he did all the necessary checks to ensure that there were no other issues with the unit.

I would highly recommend them.

name: Land Keller
text: We use Hans to service all our rentals and our personal house and they have been excellent. Once when doing a routine maintenance, they found a large problem with duct work and came back and fixed it for free.

name: s_killman
text: Used Hans for years and have always received great service. Hans and team are top notch.

name: Greg Mcginnis
text: Recently had a new HCAC unit installed. Have had numerous issues, several have yet to be resolved. Communication from this company is horrible! Office staff is rude and the owner will not return calls. I will say the technicians are very apologetic and respectful. Lesson learned but it has been an expensive one to say the least. Fournier

name: Bob Frick
text: Great Response and service

name: Clint Davis
text: They came out today (same day service) and got the AC back up and running.  Quick service, thorough, and professional.

name: Robert Mills
text: Recently bought an expensive outside unit that was installed in one corner of a sufficiently sized concrete pad.  Was promised a crew would come out and center it.  Never happened.

name: Vincent Waclawek
text: These guys are telemarketing cons artists, DO NOT USE!!

name: laura kate caldwell
text: Highly Recommended!

name: Dalton Garrett
text: Jay is #1 in the ac game

name: Brett A. Snell
text: The best!

name: Ben Myers
text: I built a small garage and needed a Heat and Air unit for it.  I decided on a Mitsubishi mini split system and called about 5 dealers in my area.  Not only was Shane the most knowledgeable about them he by far had the best price.  He was very professional along with his staff.  Lyn was always pleasant to speak to when calling the office.  His crew was very fast and did a great job installing my unit.  I thought I needed a 18,000 BTU unit and Shane assured me that a 12,000 BTU unit would be sufficient. He was correct, this thing cools my garage in no time and is very quiet.  Knowing that I had a Mitsubishi Diamond dealer install my unit and getting a 12 year warranty gives me a great peace of mind.  My hat is off to Southeastern Mechanical Service.  I highly recommend them.

name: Isaiah Folds
text: he fixed my air conditioning for great price and good attitude. 👍👍👍👍👍 highly recommended using sms.

name: Lyn Nelson
text: I would highly recommend SMS..Knowledgable & Friendly😊

name: David Champlin
text: Shane and his crew do a great job keeping all my equipment running.

name: Darrin Jones
text: Lyn and Shane andtechnician Joe have all been awesome to work with. I have rental properties in North Alabama and would never use ANYONE ELSE. They are quick, professional and fair. They are the Mitsubishi mini split pros of the Tennessee Valley. You will be treated like the best customer and in service related work, that is hard to find. Real ¨Golden Rule¨ work ethics and genuinely nice people.

name: Jeremy Cannon
text: Great Service!!! Would give more than 5-stars if I could. Our technician, Joe, was very knowledgeable about both units that we have for our two story home in Decatur. He was very thorough in his diagnosis and changed the flame sensor that was in need of replacing. He checked every piece in our furnace, including the heat exchange pipes, to make sure everything else was in good working order. No other technician that we have had before has checked this (there was a 4x4 mounted in the way of the blower coming out). Came back when another problem arose the next day and fixed that as well.

name: Pro Home Inspection Services

Their technician showed up before 9:00AM and began diagnosing my HVAC system.  In a couple hours he had gone through the cooling system from top to bottom and performed their Preventative Maintenance service on my A/C unit and it was cooling as if it were brand new.  The tech was very polite and thorough in diagnosing the issue and did an excellent job answering all my questions.  We talked a little bit about the cost of replacing the unit and what he would recommend but in no way was trying to push a sale on me.

The price for the service he performed was well below what I was expecting to pay.  These guys have certainly outdone themselves in this industry and they will be my sole source for all my HVAC needs.  I highly recommend them!

name: BlacKnight 1
text:
Great HVAC company! The owner, Shane, is very personable and the kind of guy you can trust with your door unlocked. Opie (dead ringer for a younger Ron Howard), his technician, is a relatively young guy (23), but mature beyond his years and a very good HVAC tech. He's also trustworthy and the kind of guy you would want to represent your company. Most importantly, he was able to diagnose my heat pump problem quickly and efficiently...10 to 15 minutes. The HVAC was over amped.

The company that installed my TRANE XL14 heat pump in 2007, Alabama Climate Control (ACC) of Huntsville, apparently did not notice that the heat pump was rated for max amperage of 40 amps because they did not bother to change the 50 amp circuit breaker in the panel in the garage. One would expect a professional HVAC company to do a basic electrical circuit check/test to ensure the electrical circuit is compatible with your NEW heat pump...right!?!?

Anyway, this oversight by ACC resulted in a fried circuit breaker in the junction box at the heat pump. Opie said we were lucky this situation did not result in a burned up motor or worse a burned down house. After all that, Opie tried to give me a $25 discount because I'm a veteran.

Thank you for the sentiment Opie, but also thank you for identifying a problem that has caused me great anguish over the years. I had to replace 3 or 4 compressors on the original heat pump (a Rheem) about 15 years ago when we first started renting out the house.

The HVAC company (same ACC) kept replacing all those compressors under warranty at $250 to $300 a pop for labor, but just couldn't figure out what was causing all those compressors to burn up (the same 50 amp circuit breaker in the breaker box). Then, I was dumb enough to hire them again to install a new TRANE in 2007. Remeber, the TRANE is rated for a maximum of 40 amps, but ACC left the same old 50 amp circuit breaker in the breaker panel. Voila...we get a fried junction box this time.

Incredible...that it took a young 23 year old tech with a lot less experience (but more common sense and intelligence) to recognize that a 50 amp circuit breaker is going to eventually cause some problems if it is not compatible with the rest of the circuit.

The cautionary tale here is...be extremely vigilant and careful about who you let work on your electrical systems and watch them like a hawk when they do...until you find a company like SMS that has techs like Opie.. Thank you SMS and Opie for saving my house from a potential fire.

resp.text: Thanks Dwight! We are very happy we could take care of your heat pump needs! Thanks for the great review! Please call us anytime if you have questions.

text: Very professional and was very quick to respond.  He was very knowledgeable and great to work with.  Would definitely used him again!

resp.text: Thank you

name: David Chambers
text: Last Friday night my AC froze up and stopped cooling. I called Payne’s Saturday morning and he was able to come to the house before noon. He was polite, informative and he definitely knew how to determine the issue. He provided several options for repair and told me what the cost of each would be upfront. He provided his recommendation, which I agreed with, and then repaired the unit with no hidden costs or unexpected issues. The AC has been working great and I cannot provide a higher recommendation! I will definitely call on him again when needed and I recommend him to anyone needing service/repairs!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review. I'm glad I could help.

name: AJ Woods
text: Super nice dude, works really fast and is really reliable. Only took an hour or two to get my AC running again, and after a few weeks, it's still running strong. The rate is fair, and I would definitely recommend to anyone in need of their AC fixed.

Along with the units he even replaced my thermostat with one which is WIFI enabled. This is an awesome feature. I highly recommend Harold and his company for anyone needing heating and air conditioning work.

resp.text: Thank you for such a great review. Truely a pleasure doing business with you.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and hopefully maintenace will be all you need for a long time to come. I will put you on my list and call you when its time. Thanks again!

text: Michael was awesome!!!! Found my problem in less than 10 minutes!!! Soooo happy with his performance!

text:
The entire staff has been helpful and professional! Thank you Gary, Carla and Katie for your information and guidance. Gary went out of his way to accommodate our crazy schedule. He is so knowledgeable.
Mason, Jaq and Clay arrived on time, they were professional and informative. The work was done in a timely manner, very neat and clean with attention to detail. When they were done, there was not a spec of anything left. Thank you for a job so well done!

name: Katie Willis
text: I have been using Total Comfort for about 3 years. They have always exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend this company for your heating and air needs.

name: M Tyree Wilson
text: From the initial PHONE CALL TO THE FINAL "FIST BUMP" AFTER THE INSTALL....We knew we made the right decision going with this company...The rep we set up the appointment with....EXCELLENT...The guy(Gary) that came out to do the estimate....EXCELLENT and HONEST ....The guys who performed the Install....you guessed it EXCELLENT !!!!!!  My family and I are very pleased with everything that was presented and performed....couldn't  ask for better service...Total Comfort Heating and Air is the TOTAL PACKAGE of Honesty, Service, and Professionalism ....

name: C Mallory
text: This was my first time using this company, but it definitely will not be my last. I called on a Saturday when my furnace went out, which was actually beyond repair and had to be replaced. They were very polite and courteous and I am well pleased with my new furnace.

name: kristy templeton
text: Great place. Harry is the best

name: Sylvia N.
text: Total Comfort Heating and Air is an excellent company, fully committed in delivering the absolute best service to its customer base.  The HVAC technicians are highly knowledgeable and very professional.  They  efficiently get your home back to the right temperature at a reasonable cost.  Chelsea, in the office, schedules appointments with the lowest wait time.  Harry, the service manager, is responsive to individual customer's needs and intends to exceed their expectations.  Big hearts all around with these people!  I wish other companies were this sincere in pleasing the public.

name: Ambera Law
text:
Total Comfort Heating & Air, they came out Saturday my system had frozen-up, water was leaking into the room below. .I was told me what to do over the week-end, they said they would return on Monday.
They came that Monday morning and did everything they said I needed and extra work to get my system up and working in a timely manner.  Total Comfort Heatimg & Air is a great company.  They stand on you word Thank God for a company like theirs.

name: Mrs Johnson
text: I have to say that the one person I spoke with was very polite and professional. I called their office and Mrs. Danielle pick up with a very polite and professional voice. I have several questions and she didn’t hesitate to answer any of them. I could tell she was very busy as she did have to ask me to be put on hold a few times,( which wasn’t a problem)  but each time she came back she would always apologize and make sure she helped me in any way she could. With everything going on in our world this is someone you would enjoy talking too. This to me is how you would want your fore front of your business to be. I will have no problem recommending this company or recommending Danielle to anyone.

name: Taylor Stinson
text: Landon and Justin who did our install were awesome. Really professional and knowledgeable about what they were doing. Cleaned up their area after finishing.

name: Kekke Young
text: Brett was our technician. He was very knowledgeable and efficient. He answered all of our questions.

name: Kamren P
text: I would definitely recommend this company . I called on Sat morning around 5am & someone was able to come out around 9am I only had to pay $50 for them to come out , which was awesome considering that it's the weekend . Some other companies charge a much higher fee to come out on a Sat . My technician was Tyler . He was excellent! As a woman , he made me feel very comfortable. He explained the situation clearly and informed me of my options . I didn't feel pressured , swindled , or hustled like I have by a technician from another company . He was very honest . I will definitely call them in the future .

name: Alphonso Hicks
text: My system was installed in 2014 by TC. I wasn’t impressed with the old owners, and the way they did business. The new owners are great and the Technicians are so much better than what we’ve seen in the past. Eddie did the maintenance recently and did a great job. Found some issues from the initial install and took care of them at no cost to us. Really appreciate the new owners and staff.

name: Helen Nuelle
text: My air conditioning was not functioning and the company came in checked it out  and made recommendations to correct the problem. Our new system is efficient and it was installed quickly.

name: Earl Cambron
text: Great experience working with Fisher. Would highly recommend Fisher and Total Comfort!

name: Jackie Jones
text: Thank heavens Total Comfort Hearing & Air is under new ownership! In June 2017 we replaced our old units with two American Standard ac & heating units under the previous owner and the installers were awful.  We had small gas leaks on both units, insulation around the refrigerant lines was half ass done on the downstairs unit and not even replaced on the upstairs which was dried & cracking, etc.  When I called to have the has gas smell checked out the new owners were eager to get someone sent out immediately. The smell was intermittent so I wasn't sure if there was an issue. The first time Sonny came out & took care of the downstairs gas smell.  A few hours after he left the air purifier wasn't working.  Eddie came to our house and fixed and also noticed the "dryer" was installed backwards on the both units. He corrected both problems in addition to gas smell upstairs, & addressed the insulation on the refrigerant lines.  Eddie was wonderful! We so appreciate the time he has spent to address the install issues. My husband owns a construction company and we've dealt with several HVAC companies for our home & business....hands down we are so impressed with the service Total Comfort provides.  The ladies in the office are the first impression of the company and they are awesome! Total Comfort will continue to receive our business due to the great service & and friendly demeanor of their employees!

name: Ethan Jones
text: Eddie came out to my parents place yesterday. I really appreciate the time he took taking care of their needs and he was very polite and professional. We had some less than happy experiences with this company before the new owners took over, but it looks like they have really turned things around for the better.

name: Scott Williams
text: Total Comfort came out this afternoon.  The technician was Harry. He was very polite and informative. We are getting a new furnace installed on Monday. I would highly recommend Total Comfort to anyone. Thank you so much!! Scott Williams

name: Anne Vicknair
text: After the last service my AC unit wasn’t cooling properly. Called TotalComfort and Eddie came out on a weekend and found the problem and easily corrected it at no charge. Not many companies will stand behind their work like that anymore. Really appreciate the kind and prompt service.

name: Sandra Reaves
text: Gary was very prompt, professional, and efficient.  We really appreciated his courtesy. He quickly got our air conditioner up and running.  In this hot weather, that makes him a super hero to us!!  Thank you so very much!

name: Jason Lane Garrison
text: If you’re looking for a company that’s reliable, professional and do honest work look no more.  I heard Total Comfort Heating was under new management so I was reluctant to call them but did they change my mind when I used them.  Quick to respond, professional and spent the time explaining what was going on with my unit. I’ll definitely use them again.

name: Danny Brown
text: My a/c was not operating correctly so I placed a call to One Source Heating and Cooling and asked for a service man to visit and find the problem.The ladies in the office were very nice and professional and arranged for him to come and access the situation. Sonny   ( the serviceman) arrived right on time and quickly found the problem and had me going in about 10 minutes. He was very professional as well and I certainly will be calling them again for all of my heating and cooling needs. They are the best company for their honesty, punctuality, dependability, professionalism and affordability. I'm so grateful to have them.

name: John Casada
text:
We have two HVAC systems. Total Comfort replaced our first system two years ago. Our second started acting up and we called Total Comfort again.
Harry was quick to come out, located the problems with our system and patiently explained what was wrong. He then discussed all of our options for repairing vs replacing. Unfortunately, we had to replace our 26 year old Trane system. Harry really helped us with this bad news and discussed financing options.  I hate that we have to go through this, but I am so glad that Harry was by our side. Top notch customer service with highly skilled, clean, courteous, can-do technicians. Highly recommend!

name: Carolyn Nelson
text: I’ve dealt with Total Comfort many times from maintenance to repairs and I’ve always been satisfied by their service. Eddy has been out to help us before and always seems to go that extra length to take care of our needs. We really appreciate everyone.

name: FLYBY
text: Had tech arrive, a young and inexperienced boy, explained the issues with the units, the tech did visual inspection only, never hooked up gauges, stated system is working fine. I realized the system was not working, I called 4 times, no one returned my calls, was not allowed to speak to the Manager, Jody, and was told it would be additional charge to come back. Be careful.

name: Cheryl Whitley
text: Sonny, the worker that came to help me on my AC today was a very polite, kind, and thoughtful person who took his time to explain everything that he did and why. There aren’t a lot of people who do that and I appreciate that! Thanks Sonny! Thanks Total Comfort for having a worker like Sonny!

name: Sonya Smith
text: Great experience from start to finish. I talked to Chelsea in the office and she sent Eddie out to service my Furnace the same day. Very friendly and knowledgeable company.

name: Robert Blackwell
text: Love the new owners and their Service Technicians! Eddie took care of everything we needed and got our AC running the same night. Vast improvements in service since the new owners took over.

name: Jason Lassiter
text:
Amending my original review: after an initial failure to properly schedule my appointment (see original review below) Total Comfort called the next business day to apologize and to make things right. They offered to send a technician right away and offered to waive the service call fee to make up for the inconvenience. I really appreciated this. Anyone who accepts responsibility for a mistake and makes a good faith effort to fix things gets a second chance with me. The technician, who was nice and professional, quickly found and fixed the issue (a simple clog). Before he left we got a call from the owner who explained that there would be no charge for the service. All in all Total Comfort really turned things around and they will get my future business.

Original Review: I made an appointment. They did not call and did not show. Can't recommend.

name: Rick Whited II
text: Everyone I got to work with was extremely polite, knowledgeable and very professional.

resp.text:
Thanks for the kind words.  We look forward to working with you in the future.

Thanks,

Keith

name: Alantha Russ
text: Nothing but good things to say about this company. Eddie came out today for the normal maintenance and did a great job as usual. We really appreciate the time Total Comfort puts in to making sure a job is done right.

name: Sam Henderson
text: Total Comfort came to our rescue!  This winter Charter/ Spectrum caused an electricity surge at my house starting and electrical fire, frying my HVAC system and frying the motor on a refrigerator and freezer. Total Comfort saved us before it got to cold by coming out and quoting us a fair cost and then doing the repairs quickly and with quality work. I know I will continue to use them!  Great people. Great Service. As for Charter, not so much.

name: Kaz McFly
text: I thought I needed to replace my AC but Harry with Total Comfort came out and spotted the problem and fixed it. He could have gotten me to buy a new unit but didn't. Instead he allowed me to take my time and not make a rush decision by fixing the problem. I highly recommend Total Comfort. Honest, nice and fast service

name: Frankie Roe
text: We had a great experience with Total Comfort Heating and Air. Our heat had stopped working suddenly.  When I called the office to make the appt., the lady I spoke with was helpful and courteous. Gary came out, was very nice, and within a few minutes, our heat was up and running again.  Would highly recommend these folks!!

name: Dennis Bryant
text: I bought a unit from this Company 10 years ago and it was an awful experience. To much to list. The unit went down this winter and i called to check on warranty information on the unit. Now this unit was purchased for my parents house and both are disabled. With that said my guard was up. As i placed the call i found that Total Comfort is under new management. Expecting the worst. Boy was i wrong. The new management and ownership at Total Comfort was a huge breathe of fresh air. The team at Total Comfort was honest and up front with me from the start. They offered about as much help to me as they could. The Technician named Soni that worked on my parents unit went above and beyond to take care of my parents. If you had a bad experience in the past then believe me its a new day with this Company. I personally want to say thank you to the team at Total Comfort for bending over backwards to give me any and every option they could. From an angry customer years ago to a customer that will only call the new team at Total for anything me or my family members need. Thank you Total for all your help.

name: Belinda Allen
text: Great company. Eddie came and installed a part I needed yesterday. Very polite and friendly.

name: J Davis
text: Can’t say enough good things about this company! Gary came out on a Saturday after 6 to fix our air out at Logan Martin. When I say that we were suffering, we were absolutely miserable in this house! It took him less than 10 minutes to fix the issue and cooled down a house full of women who came home after a Pell City mud run to an 87 degree house. Highly recommend Gary and Total Comfort heat and air!

name: Keely O'Really
text: Very honest and quick to diagnose our problems. We had 2 other companies come out and tell us 2 different things are wrong with our A/C unit only to find out by the Total Comfort tech that that was not the problem and even got our AC running for the time being until we could get it fix. Great service, came on time, and very polite and knowledgable. I recommend them to anyone who is in need of AC repair.

name: Margret Battle
text: Eddie came out last week to clean our package unit and thankfully caught some small issues before they caused major problems. He gave us a good price for repairs and helped us get financed quickly. Thanks TC

name: Diane Cook
text:
Absolutely wonderful experience. I had a total HVAC replacement plus blown in insulation. All technicians were on time, clean, courteous and completely professional. I will give them an A+ for a great job done.
Diane Cook

name: Kendall Jackson
text: Great experience.  Excellent new management and fair pricing!  Prompt service response.  Would recommend

name: Jason Smith
text: Just had our whole system replaced, and the guys at Total Comfort did a great job. Gary kept in touch with his whereabouts and time frame for the initial service call, and got the broken down system patched up long enough to get the new system in the following morning . The guys showed up with all the equipment before 8am and went straight to work after a friendly meet and greet with our dogs, who love company . They were both friendly and efficient, cleaned up after themselves, finished well before the estimated time frame, and did it all for a price that was on the low side of what we expected to pay . I would recommend these guys for any heating and cooling needs.

name: Carrie Cotney
text: Great experience! The service technician was polite and worked efficiently to solve our issue.  The new owners have done a great job!  I highly recommend Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Paige Cooper
text: I would recommend DJ for any services needed. He is friendly, courteous, and he cares about his customers.

name: Dustin Wilkerson
text: Excellent company to do business with. I highly recommend giving these guys a chance if you are in need of any HVAC work. It is my understanding they are under new ownership and are eager to ensure all of their customers are happy. They have definitely earned future business and recommendations from me.

name: Cal Markert
text: Saved me money with honest access net and only charged 50 for service call.  They knew what they were doing too.  Very pleased

name: Byron Williams
text: Thanks to Total Comfort for getting use up and running again. We appreciate the quick service and professional staff that came out to service our HVAC. After the tech explained everything I could readily see the problem and felt very comfortable going ahead with the repair. They where very professional.  We are very impressed.

name: Nathan Whitaker
text: We are attempting to sell our house and had an issue arise during inspection. Eddie had serviced the unit 2 weeks earlier and everything was in working order. We explained the issue about how we were held up with being able to close because of the inspection. Total Comfort went above and beyond and immediately came to ensure things were ok. Turns out that the inspector was wrong. The unit was working correctly. I video taped it to show the buyers the problem was not Total Comfort. It was their inspector. We have used Totsl Comfort for years and plan to have them install and new unit at our new home later. Eddie is the man!

name: debby cochran

I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME! name: lori krauss
text: Can not say enough about this company and Gary Dailey.  We noticed our air was not working around 3 pm on a Saturday. We were at our lake house in Talladega. I called four other companies, that said they were 24/7. None would return a call. No one even answered. I called Total Comfort and spoke to Gary. We were almost near heat stroke at this point. He could sense the desperation in my voice. He said let me make a few calls, and if I'm able I'll be on my way. Ten minutes later he called back and said he was on his way. Drove from Gardendale to Talladega to look at our unit and see what could be done. He was a lifesaver. It was the capacitor. He had a new one on his truck, and fixed it within 30 minutes. What normally would have cost a lot, on a Saturday evening was a few hundred bucks or so. I would have given them 10 stars if I could have. WE WILL NEVER USE ANYONE BUT TOTAL COMFORT AGAIN!!! IM not a person that leaves reviews, but I have never seen such amazing customer service EVER.

A unit of this age (when properly installed) should have zero issues cooling a townhome of my size and should (in general) have no problems. AWESOME SERVICE and AWESOME PRICES!
(Honest, integrity, fair, compassionate etc...)
The absolute BEST in town!!!!!

Hands down this company is the best in town! They try their best to save money when possible rater than trying to “up-sale” when a quick fix is an option.  Their Tech, (Chris Carr) is awesome!  He was so very helpful, considerate and professional.   Our experience with using this company on 4/13/21 has made us “Joyful Jolly Clients Forever”. If you looking for an honest company who sincerely looks for ways to help customers save money then call Jolly ONLY, you won’t be disappointed trust me.
I’d give this company 15 stars if I could as they rank far above 5 stars in every category from the first call I made to the end of the service call.
I would not just rate them “good” on their evaluation, I would rate them “great” in every category. They are all excellent and very professional.   They have made us “new customers”  for life because of customer service, quality and affordability  and we plan to tell everyone we know on Facebook and social media as word of mouth and great experience is the best advertising.
Jolly has brought back the true old fashion “customer service”  we once expected years ago that got lost over the years.  If you want to experience the traditional customer service of years ago, call JOLLY!

Simply a great company for in every single category!

name: Danny Kirchar
text: This was by far the most pleasant and professional encounter I have ever had with a company before. The technician was super polite and extremely warm and gracious and thoroughly explained the services needed AND gave me an exact cost. It did take a little while to get together the money for him. But even then he remained very patient and extremely helpful and just so pleasant. I'll never use another HVAC service as long as Jolly is in business

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and support of our family!

name: Jennifer Noland
text: Beware! Technician came to my house to rewire a thermostat. Once there, he told me that we had blown the transformer and fuse on the main unit and the cost at that point would be $624 to replace those 2 things and rewire the thermostat. I told him I couldn't afford that and he said "well mam I can't help you with that. There's nothing else I can do for you then." I needed my ac running so I gathered up every cent I had and told him to go ahead with the repair. He then came in and told me that the thermostat wasn't telling the unit to kick on so we must have fried the new thermostat also. He left the base plate wired up and told me that it was wired correctly and I just needed to go get a new touchpad and it would work. He is a professional and I trusted his word so I paid him the $600 and he left without it working. It was late Saturday night so I ran and got the new one first thing Sunday morning. I put it on the wall and it would not work. I had to call another repairman to come out and fix it Sunday. There was nothing wrong with the 1st thermostat. The problem was that the Jolly technician wired it wrong. Now I question everything he did that night. I feel like I paid a lot of money for absolutely nothing. I have called twice and cannot get a call back. I should have refused to pay but I trusted this guys word. I will not make that mistake again. Please be careful when dealing with this company!!!!

resp.text:
Jennifer,
We are looking into the ticket now.  We are sorry to learn that your experience with Jolly was anything less than stellar!  Someone from our office will be contacting you shortly.

After a two year absolute nightmare with our home warranty company (American Home Shield) who sent Meyer’s Comfort Specialist to our home to install a new air conditioner, we now have a new unit installed by Jolly!!! name: Andy Maddox
text: I called Jolly early in the morning to set up appointment between 1:00 and 4:00 PM. It was around 3:30 and I was starting to wonder if they were going to miss the scheduled appointment and not call me. They called me around 3:45 to let me know that technicians were running a little late but they would definitely be coming today (I appreciated the courtesy call). Technician called me around 4:10 to let me know they were on their way. They also emailed me with a short bio on the technician and his photo. When I got home to meet them, they had already fixed the unit. Friendly, professional and didn't feel like I was getting scammed. Great experience. I will use them again in the future. Much better experience than another major HVAC contractor in Tuscaloosa. Jolly is my new "go-to" HVAC contractor in Tuscaloosa.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving a review for our company.  Your attention to detail and well written review will help others to know what to expect when calling for service.  We truly appreciate you!

name: Christopher Lyons
text: James did a great job hooking up our mini-splits. Hard worker and made sure the job was completed correctly.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Lyons for mentioning the great work that James provided for you!  We truly appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback.

name: Sheryl McKinley
text: Russ was very conscientious and arrived in a timely manner. He answered all of our questions and was very thorough! Highly recommend Jolly Heating and Air!

resp.text: Thank you, Sheryl!  We appreciate your feedback.  We will be sure to share your comments with Russ.

name: Jackson Willis
text:
Very prompt service, however the promptness comes at a high price. Came first thing in the morning and fixed what they thought was the problem. $80 diagnostic and then $120 to clean the flame sensor. $120 is really high for that, but the service had already been performed before I was informed of it, so had to pay.

Left, had an issue 2 hours later. Came back quickly, which was nice, but found that the circuit board was bad on the furnace. Had to replace. Very high price that I was able to negotiate down a little bit, but now my heat works.

Great service, but at an astronomical price.

name: Krista Slagel
text: Very friendly and professional staff! Russ was our tech and we give him 5 stars as well! Definitely recommending Jolly to others!

resp.text: Krista, thank you for taking the time to let us know how we did!  We will be sure to let Russ know that he received 5 stars for a job well done!

text: Service came at a GREAT price. Too expensive for my budget but I had to get my air repaired asap because i was having surgery the following  day.

resp.text: Hi Annette!  I know that air conditioning repairs can be an unexpected expense so we so try and give competitive prices for our services.   There is almost always a coupon being offered to help with some of the cost to repair.  This coupon is on our website and Facebook page for use at any time.  Coupon expired? Just give us a call and we will be more than happy to work you.  Providing same day service and well- trained technicians can incur a cost that we do our best to keep as low as possible.  I get that not everyone can make the choice to use Jolly.  Our service does not work for everyone’s budget. If you decide it works for you, we’d love to have you.

text: Jolly is a great company.  Technician did great work and gave great money-saving advise. Will definitely use Jolly again n the future!

name: Julie Lewis
text: I am so thankful for Jolly Heating & Air.  I called them about a problem with my A/C unit and they were at my house within the hour. I have 2 children who would have been frozen in our cold winter if it wasn't for them coming out so quickly. Thank you for your speedy service! Will definitely use again and will recommend to anyone who needs work done quickly.

name: Anne Davis
text: The company sent a person the very same day I called with a problem. The young man was very knowledgeable and very delightful to talk with. So happy we bought our gas logs from Jolly Heating, we have enjoyed them so much!

name: Martin Agnew
text:
While in the process of selling my home, a technician came out to inspect my fully functioning unit. After leaving, my unit was no longer pushing air through the house and there was a pungent burning smell. I contacted Jolly, but no assistance was offered without a $150 service call charge plus the cost of parts, which he said would run around $2,500. He then quickly solicited me to instead consider buying a new unit from them instead of paying the $2,500 to repair the unit.

The next day I had a technician from another HVAC company come to look at the unit and they said the report Jolly had written was nearly entirely false, and the reason the unit was no longer working was because the technician from Jolly did not reconnect the blower wheel.

Not only might this affect the sale of my home, but my wife and 18 month old daughter were forced to stay somewhere else because they had no heat in the middle of December.

resp.text:
Mr. Agnew,
Anytime you have an issue with a price, you can always call the office during normal business hours and talk to our Office Manager.  She is always here willing to help.  I cannot confirm what the other company you called out found.  I trust my technicians and their expertise more than any other company.  An inspection took place and the proper pictures are on file from that inspection.  All paperwork supports the repairs noted in the inspection.

name: Mary Catherine Barnes Sutphin
text:
I can not say enough wonderful things about this company, from the scheduling desk to the service crew, they are all amazing! I would like to give a special “thank you” to the three men that came to our home in the past two days, John, Brody, & Steve. All three men delivered top quality customer service, while also allowing me, as a stay at home mom, a sense of trust and comfort that the service being provided to us was one we needn’t question. These gentlemen were very thorough with their original diagnostic visit, and also very kind to answer all of my questions. I have hired companies, prior to Bradberry , to repair our HVAC unit, and many a time I have been left feeling “swindled” or ignored. (I.E. rather discuss the business at hand with my husband). We’ve had multiple companies, even just send out a salesperson, instead of looking at all possible cost saving options for our family’s financial situation. I have been disheartened by other companies, to say the least...

That’s why I am so honored to write a five star review for the company of, Bradberry. They have gone above and beyond meeting my expectations. For years our family has “band aided” our AC unit, we knew it would be in the near future to get a new unit, however, Bradberry, and their service workers, still gave us multiple different options to consider.

After much deliberation, my husband and I did decide to replace the HVAC UNIT. All diagnostics, financing, and installation were done in 24hrs. (Keep in mind this is also at the end of May, in Alabama, when the heat is unbearable). These gentlemen had a kind smile on their faces the whole time, while also giving clear and concise details on what to expect going forward.

Like I said, I cannot say enough wonderful things about the customer service and products that Bradberry delivered to our family.
Thank you to the three gentlemen and the company of Bradberry for exceeding my expectations. I am truly thankful, and so much more comfortable!

-Mary Sutphin

resp.text: Thanks for your business Mary Catherine!! We are glad your experience was nothing short of great. Please spread the word in your area and we will take care of anyone you send our way.

name: Rose Cavender
text:
** HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! **
have recently purchased my first home and my gas hot water heater had been going out. They replaced the hot water heater, but I still didn’t have hot water in the showers. I called the emergency phone number and told them my issue, the woman was incredibly nice and someone had returned my phone call within 30 minutes and was on my way to fix the issue at 8:30pm. Unfortunately, the next day after the fix, I still didn’t have hot water (it wasn’t staying warm long enough for a shower) and I called the emergency number again (it was 9:30pm). Same woman answered, again, incredibly nice. Within the hour, someone had reached my cell number and was scheduling an appt for the next day to resolve the issue (they would’ve come that night but I had to be at work so I told them to wait until the next day).
Long story short, it had nothing to do with the hot water heater, but the fixtures in the shower had recently been replaced prior to the inspection on my house. So the service man, Robert, changed the settings in both shower fixtures to allow more hot water to come out.
Great service, quick reply time and great all around!
HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

resp.text: Rose, thanks for choosing us for your new home needs. We value our customers feedback, and appreciate you taking the time to post a review.

name: rehabconsult
text: We just had our heating and cooling system replaced by the folks at Bradberry Service Company. We live in Lexington Downs and they came highly recommended by neighbors that had recently used their services. We were not disappointed. In fact, the professionalism and skill demonstrated by each member of their installation team was a pleasure to watch. Each member of the team seemed to make an extra effort to keep us informed of each step of the installation process without us even asking. Every member, without exception, was very professional and each seemed to know their job. I highly recommend this company for any needs you may have with your heating and cooling system. They displayed a welcomed work ethic which was refreshing and very much appreciated by this customer!!!

resp.text: Thanks for your business and the rave review! We value your feedback and are happy your experience was refreshing.

name: Rob Kizer
text:
In fairness to the reader and the company my experience was as followed:
My old unit went out, I had just moved into this home about 6 months beforehand. Seeing the service number on the unit I called them just because they had serviced the unit before. They came out and were straight shooters after evaluating the unit that day, and determined it had to be replaced. After taking the time I needed to make a decision on the unit they promptly scheduled a service date and installed the unit.
I had an extremely high power bill the following month, and to their credit the technician came out on a Saturday in the middle of potential severe weather and identified and hopefully resolved the issue that caused my power bill to be so high. I give these guys the benefit of the doubt, and chalk it up to an anomaly. I don't expect to see a bill for the correction, and I DO recommend their service in the future because they strike me as good, hard working, and honest people.

resp.text: Rob, I’m aware of the issue with your old existing thermostat wiring in the wall, and I apologize for the issue. I appreciate your fair review in this matter. Of course there is not a charge at all for the work we performed Saturday to correct your issue in pulling new thermostat wire. We appreciate your business and please let us know if there is anything else we can do in the future!

text: 1,000% recommend these guys. Bought a new house and it has 2 units which are over 10 years old, so naturally they've needed some attention. I've called other companies before and they have to go get a part and come back or they have to call someone else to come look at the problem, but these guys are good - they know what they're doing and get you fixed on the spot. They're also neat when they work, they've never left a mess behind which happened to me with another company, never called them back even when they did good work. text: Bradberry Service Company is top notch!  Called on a Sunday, had a new HVAC unit and electric hot water heater installed and running on Wednesday afternoon. We were amazed to watch the guys walking around our garage and the side of the house looking for any kind of trash they may have left behind.  “We don’t want you to run over anything we left behind and have a flat tire” is what they told me. Who does that in this day and time?  Bradberry Service Company does.  They came back to service our unit a couple of weeks ago to make sure it was Winter ready, although the unit was just installed in April, Bradberry Service Company spent a hour looking over everything and making sure we were ready for cooler weather.  We would recommend this group of professionals to anyone and everybody.

name: Amber Flores
text: We went with them about a year ago and they did a decent job but not this time. We had absolutely no air in 90 degree weather. We called Friday and they told us they were busy and may not get to us that day which was fine (we wanted to go with them since we did last year so we didn't call anyone else) and they took our name and number and said they'd give us a call back that day and let us know when they could come. Late Friday no call, no text. I called and left a voice mail letting them know. Monday still no call so I called them again. We left another voice-mail. At this time we decided to call another company who scheduled us in as an emergency since it was so hot outside. It is now Wednesday and we have yet to get a call back from this company and our air is running beautifully thanks to the other awesome company we went with. My problem isn't the fact that they may have been too busy and couldn't see us this week,, my problem is the fact they couldn't call and let us know at any time in the past 6 days when the weather has been over 90 degrees in the house.

name: Mark Engelmeyer
text:
During the quoting process for a  complete replacement Heat Pump for my 15 year old system we reached out to Hembree Heating & Air Conditioning.
They had been recommended to me from a neighbor.  We scheduled a time  to meet and discuss replacement options and quote the replacement system.  Madison called the morning of the estimate and Josh Hembree called, as promised, one hour prior to the meeting time.  Josh arrived on time and came prepared with all necessary information on a variety of systems available.  We were searching for a reliable system with an excellent warranty.  Josh offered an American Standard with an extended warranty through Hembree at a very fair and reasonable price.  The quote was under our budget which allowed us to step up to a 16 SEER system.  Overall, the quote for the 16 SEER system was less than any other quote we had received.  Josh schedule an install date for the following week.  Walt gave me a call on hour before the scheduled install.  Walt and Colin arrived on time to conduct the install as promised.  They were both very knowledgeable, friendly and professional.  The installation of the system was completed on time the day of starting the install.  The entire system functions flawlessly and is so much cleaner and more professional performing than my old system.  Josh Hembree and the entire Team at Hembree Heating & Air Conditioning are friendly, knowledgeable and trustworthy.  The final price was exactly as quoted and we continue to enjoy our new American Standard Heating and Air Conditioning Heat Pump.  I recommend Hembree Heating & Air Conditioning to all of my family, friends and will continue to use them for all of my future HVAC needs.

name: mike norris
text: I absolutely could not be more satisfied in the professional service that Hembree provided me!  I had to replace two systems due to Hurricane Sally and Hembree made this process so much easier than I expected.  From the initial consultation with Josh to discuss my options to the top notch installation by Chris and Morgan.  I was consistently kept in communication with what to expect, recommendations and progress.  They were prompt, courteous and did an amazing job with the installation.  I never thought I would be so excited about a new HVAC system!  However, Hembree exceeded all my expectations and I would not hesitate to use them again!  I highly recommend this company!!

resp.text: Mr. Norris, you are so kind. Thank you for your thoughtful review! We have thoroughly enjoyed working for you and will always be here for you should you need us again in the future. Enjoy your two new 17 SEER systems!
